§ 306112. Waiver of provisions in event of natural disaster or imminent threat to national security The Secretary shall promulgate regulations under which the requirements of this subchapter (except section 306108) may be waived in whole or in part in the event of a major natural disaster or an imminent threat to national security. (Pub. L. 113–287, § 3, Dec. 19, 2014, 128 Stat. 3227.)
